channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: Highlights from seven Premier League matches, including champions Liverpool's encounter with Aston Villa at Anfield. Title rivals Arsenal are in action at Burnley, whilst Sean Dyche's first home game in charge of Nottingham Forest sees them take on Manchester United. Elsewhere, there's a London derby as Spurs host Chelsea, with Brighton v Leeds, Fulham v Wolves and Crystal Palace v Brentford completing the line-up.
